hero.title: Building Tomorrow's Leaders Today
hero.description: Learn about our journey, mission, and the values that drive us to excel in education.

story.title: A Legacy of Excellence Since 2010
story.paragraph1: Subhakamana School was founded with a vision to provide world-class education in Nepal. Starting with just 50 students and 5 teachers, we have grown into one of the most respected educational institutions in Kathmandu.
story.paragraph2: Today, we serve over 1500 students with 85+ dedicated faculty members. Our alumni have gone on to achieve success in diverse fields, from medicine and engineering to arts and entrepreneurship.

cta.title: Ready to join Merryland?
cta.description: Apply today and give your child the best education journey.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Merryland School

q1.question: What grades does Merryland School offer?
q1.answer: Merryland School offers education from Nursery to Grade 10, providing a comprehensive learning environment for students aged 3 to 16 years.

q2.question: What is the admission process?
q2.answer: The admission process involves filling out an online application form, submitting required documents, attending an interview, and completing an entrance assessment. Click the 'Apply Now' button to start your application.

q3.question: What are the school hours?
q3.answer: Our school operates from 8:00 AM to 3:30 PM from Sunday to Friday. We also offer extended day programs for working parents.

q4.question: What curriculum does the school follow?
q4.answer: Merryland School follows the national curriculum prescribed by the Government of Nepal, integrated with modern teaching methodologies and international best practices.

q5.question: Do you provide transportation services?
q5.answer: Yes, we provide safe and reliable bus transportation covering major areas of Kathmandu Valley. Our buses are equipped with GPS tracking and trained staff.

q6.question: What extracurricular activities are available?
q6.answer: We offer a wide range of activities including sports (football, basketball, cricket), arts (music, dance, painting), technology clubs, debate teams, and community service programs.

q7.question: What are the class sizes?
q7.answer: We maintain a student-teacher ratio of 1:20 to ensure personalized attention and effective learning for every student.

q8.question: Are there scholarships available?
q8.answer: Yes, we offer merit-based and need-based scholarships to deserving students. Please contact our admissions office for detailed information on scholarship opportunities.
